page.title: 17Pubs & hotel at Bourne End 2
page.content: {LOCAL TRADE. } The hotel is used by local people mainly at the weekends for dinner dances,private parties,Sunday lunch and wedding receptions.There are about 16 or 17 of the latter in the Summer. In addition local societies such as the Round Table and the Lions have meetings there in the evenings. There are three pubs in Bourne End,two on the A.41 and one by the canal.All are old buildings and attract custom because they are picturesque. The publicans described their businesses as 'fair weather trade'that is people flock to them in Summer but otherwise they rely more on passing trade and the business man's lunches. Nowadays pubs provide attraction other than food and drink.The past year has included disco's,scalectrix display, Beaujolais run,New Year fancy dress.
